| -------------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------- |

| `valueChange`  |             | `CustomEvent<DotFieldValueEvent>`  |


## Methods

### `reset() => void`

Reset properties of the filed, clear value and emit events.

#### Returns

Type: `void`
